Package com.tiyb.tev.controller

This package contains Controllers for the application (both REST and UI).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TEVAdminToolsController
    A REST controller with some administration tools for working with the database behind the scenes.
    TEVAnswerController
    REST controller for working with Answers
    TEVConvoRestController
    REST controller for working with Conversations and Conversation Messages.
    TEVErrorController
    Controller for handling errors within the application.
    TEVHashtagController
    REST controller for working with hashtags.
    TEVLinkController
    REST controller for working with Link items.
    TEVMetadataRestController
    REST controller for working with the application's Metadata -- it's settings.
    TEVPhotoController
    REST controller for working with photos.
    TEVPostRestController
    This is the REST controller for working with Post data, including special kinds of posts such as "regular" and "photo" posts.
    TEVRegularController
    REST controller for working with Regular posts.
    TEVStagingController
    This is the REST controller for working with items to be staged for eventual export.
    TEVUIController
    Controller for all UI (HTML pages / jQuery-enabled) for the TEV application.
    TEVVideoController
    REST controller for working with Videos.

Package com.tiyb.tev.controller Description

This package contains Controllers for the application (both REST and UI).

A "more is better than less" approach has been taken -- some APIs have been created even if they aren't used by the TEV application, just in case.

Author:
tiyb
